title: The Secret Reason Why Batman is A Hero!
description:
Batman stands as a paragon of the cardinal virtues, but it's his unwavering fortitude, as brilliantly showcased in Neil Gaiman’s 'Whatever Happened to the Caped Crusader,' that sets him apart from his peers like Superman. Through the lens of prudence, justice, temperance, and fortitude, we can see the depths of the Dark Knight's admirable persistence.

#Batman #Superheroes #CardinalVirtues #Fortitude #NeilGaiman #GothamHero #ComicBooksExplained
